data.title: Hank Azaria (Actor)
data.meta_description: Noted for being one of the principal voice actors on the animated television series "The Simpsons" (1989–present), on which he performs the...
data.text:
Full Name: Henry Albert Azaria

Profession: Actor

Biography: Noted for being one of the principal voice actors on the animated television series "The Simpsons" (1989–present), on which he performs the voices of Moe Szyslak, Apu Nahasapeemapetilon, Chief Wiggum, Comic Book Guy, Carl Carlson and numerous others.

Azaria is alo a comic and dramatic actor, appearing in such films as "The Birdcage" (1997) and "Godzilla" (1998). His TV roles include "Mad About You", "Friends" and "Huff".

Both Azaria's voice work and acting has been nominated for numerous awards and he won six Emmy awards.

Born: April 25, 1964

Birthplace: New York City, New York, USA

Age: 60 years old
